actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to authorize a grant program for research and development of alternative fuels for motor vehicles.

summary.text: Authorizes a grant program and appropriation of $10,000,000 from the Highway Trust Fund for research and development of alternative fuels for motor vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to authorize a grant program for research and development of alternative fuels for motor vehicles.
